descr.p: Useful functions for a Pascal mole that generates a menu. Each call to Info, Error, or Item adds that kind of Gopher menu item to the newly generated menu.
The unit handles the formatting of the actual menu.

element.name: error
element.short: Add an inline text error message

element.name: Info
element.short: Add an inline text info message

descr.p: Adds an item of the specified type, with the specified display text, pointing to the specified path.
ItemHost defaults to the REMOTE_HOST environment variable that should be passed to this mole by the Gopher server.
ItemPort defaults to the REMOTE_PORT environment variable that should be passed to this mole by the Gopher server.
